member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZonesCollection.Clear
member.summary: Remove all items from the collection.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone
member.summary: Represents a series of bands or shapes that can be placed behind the plotted area, but in front of the chart background.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.ShouldSerializeBackColor
member.summary: Returns false if the BackColor property is in the default state. The default state is to inherit the BackColor from the Chart2DPlotArea object.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.ResetBackColor
member.summary: Resets the BackColor property to default state.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.ShouldSerializeForeColor
member.summary: Returns false if the ForeColor property is in the default state. The default state is to inherit the ForeColor from the Chart2DPlotArea object.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.ResetForeColor
member.summary: Resets the ForeColor property to default state.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.BackColor
member.summary:
Gets or sets the background color of the ChartAlarmZone.
Inherits from plot area. A ChartAlarmZone always displays the BackColor when showing the zone. If a Pattern is used, the ForeColor is also used to draw the pattern lines.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.ForeColor
member.summary:
Gets or sets the foreground color of the ChartAlarmZone.
Inherits from plot area. A ChartAlarmZone always displays the BackColor when showing the zone. If a Pattern is used, the ForeColor is also used to draw the pattern lines.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.FarExtent
member.summary:
Gets or sets the far extent of the ChartAlarmZone in X-axis data coordinates.
Typically, the FarExtent is the larger X value in data coordinates that the ChartAlarmZone extends. If the FarExtent and NearExtent are both zero, then both are assumed to be the Max and Min values of the X-axis, respectively.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.NearExtent
member.summary:
Gets or sets the near extent of the ChartAlarmZone in X-axis data coordinates.
Typically, the NearExtent is the smaller X value in data coordinates that the ChartAlarmZone extends. If the FarExtent and NearExtent are both zero, then both are assumed to be the Max and Min values of the X-axis, respectively.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.UpperExtent
member.summary:
Gets or sets the upper extent of the ChartAlarmZone in Y-axis data coordinates.
Typically, the UpperExtent is the larger Y value in data coordinates that the ChartAlarmZone extends. If the UpperExtent and LowerExtent are both zero, then both are assumed to be the Max and Min values of the Y-axis, respectively.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.LowerExtent
member.summary:
Gets or sets the lower extent of the ChartAlarmZone in Y-axis data coordinates.
Typically, the LowerExtent is the smaller Y value in data coordinates that the ChartAlarmZone extends. If the UpperExtent and LowerExtent are both zero, then both are assumed to be the Max and Min values of the Y-axis, respectively.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.GroupIndex
member.summary:
Gets or sets the index of the data group of the ChartAlarmZone.
The group index indicates the Chart2DGroup for which the ChartAlarmZone extents specify the data coordinates of the ChartAlarmZone. If the group index specifies a non-existent Chart2DGroup, the ChartAlarmZone is not drawn.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.MinHeight
member.summary:
Gets or sets the ChartAlarmZone minimum height, in twips.
If the height of the ChartAlarmZone is less than the specified value in twips, the ChartAlarmZone is drawn with the specified height. Applicable only for Cartesian charts and rectangular or elliptical shaped alarm zones.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.MinWidth
member.summary:
Gets or sets the ChartAlarmZone minimum width, in twips.
If the width of the ChartAlarmZone is less than the specified value in twips, the ChartAlarmZone is drawn with the specified width. Applicable only for Cartesian charts and rectangular or elliptical shaped alarm zones.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the ChartAlarmZone.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.PatternStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the pattern style to be used if PatternVisible is true. The PatternStyle is penned in the ChartAlarmZone ForeColor.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.PatternVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the specified PatternStyle should be used to brush the background of the ChartAlarmZone.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.Shape
member.summary:
Gets or sets the shape of the ChartAlarmZone.
A ChartAlarmZone of rectangle shape is specified by the rectangle bounded by the data coordinates specified by the extents of the ChartAlarmZone.
A ChartAlarmZone of elliptical shape is specified by the rectangle bounded by the data coordinates specified by the extents of the ChartAlarmZone.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlarmZone.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility of the ChartAlarmZone.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroups
member.summary: Represents information related to data values and appearance of the 2D chart groups.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroups.ReversedDraw
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the order in which the Chart2DGroups are normally drawn is reversed.
The normal order is Group1, then Group0. If this property is true the order is Group0, then Group1.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroups.Group0
member.summary: Gets the foreground Chart2DGroup.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroups.Group1
member.summary: Gets the background Chart2DGroup.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup
member.summary: Represents a 2D chart group which contains chart data and classes that control chart appearance.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.ChartType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of chart to display.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.AxisXType
member.summary: Gets or sets the data type for AxisX.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Is100Percent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the stacked chart is 100% chart. Applies only to line, bar and area charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.LegendReversed
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the order in which the series entries of each Chart2DGroup appear in the legend is reversed.
The series of each Chart2DGroup normally appear in index order in the legend. If this property is true, the series entries appear in reversed order.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Stacked
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the chart should stack the data (for appropriate chart types).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Use3D
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether 3D effects are used for charting the data in the Chart2DGroup.
member.remarks: If Chart2DView3D data contains non-zero values for Depth, Rotation and Elevation, 3D effects are added to various charts, including Area, Bar, Pie and XYPlot charts. However, the Use3D property for a Chart2DGroup can override the use of 3D effects, allowing one group to be presented with 3D effects and the other group to be charted without 3D effects.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Chart2DGroup is visible.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.ShowOutline
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether figures drawn should be outlined in the Chart2DPlotArea ForeColor. Such figures include Bars, Pies, Areas, etc.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.OutlineColor
member.summary:
Gets or sets the color used to draw figure outlines. Such figures include Bars, Pies, Areas, etc.
By default, outlines are drawn in the PlotArea ForeColor. Set this to Transparent color to use the default Chart2DPlotArea ForeColor.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.ChartData
member.summary: Gets the Chart2DData object containing the numerical series to be charted and display information for each series.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Pie
member.summary: Gets the ChartPie object containing properties specific to Pie charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Bar
member.summary: Gets the ChartBar object containing properties specific to Bar charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Polar
member.summary: Gets the ChartPolar object containing properties specific to Polar charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Radar
member.summary: Gets the ChartRadar object containing properties specific to Radar charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Bubble
member.summary: Gets the ChartBubble object containing properties specific to Bubble charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Hilo
member.summary: Gets the ChartHiLo object containing properties specific to Hi-Lo chart types, including Hi-Lo, Hi-Lo-Open-Close and Candle charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Gantt
member.summary: Gets the ChartGantt object containing properties specific to Gantt charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DGroup.Histogram
member.summary: Gets the ChartHistogram object containing properties specific to Histogram charts.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Pie charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie.Clockwise
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether each series is drawn in clockwise or counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie.InnerRadius
member.summary: Gets or sets the inner radius used for doughnut charts. A value greater than zero specifies the percentage of the full pie radius used for the doughnut hole.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie.OtherOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset value used to vary diameter of the pie within the charting area.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie.Start
member.summary: Gets or sets the starting angle of the first Pie slice, in degrees. The angle represents the arc between the most clockwise edge of the first slice and the right horizontal radius of the pie, as measured in the counter-clockwise direction.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie.LegendLayout
member.summary: Gets or sets the append content of each legend item.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPie.SliceDetachment
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating which slice would be detached from the single pie chart.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Bar charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.Appearance
member.summary: Gets or sets the appearance of a bar chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.BarLineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color used to render BarLines indicated by the BarLines property (only applies to stacked bar and column charts).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.BarLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether 2D stacked bar and column charts render lines from common series rectangles from one point to the next.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.BarLineThickness
member.summary: Gets or sets the thickness of bar lines indicated by the BarLines property, in twips. Only applies to stacked bar and column charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.ClusterOverlap
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage by which bar elements in the same cluster overlap.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.ClusterWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage that each bar cluster occupies. The percentage applies to the closest clusters.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.MixedStacking
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether bar charts with mixed positive and negative values display both stacks at each point. Always True for 3D bars.
If True, postive values are stacked above the origin and negative values are stacked below the origin.
If False, values are stacked by simple addition of values in series order.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBar.MultiRow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the 3D bar chart is plotted using multiple rows.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPolar
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Polar charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPolar.Degrees
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Start value is specified in degrees or radians.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPolar.Start
member.summary:
Gets or sets the starting angle, measured counter-clockwise from the 12 o'clock position.
The angle is measured in degrees if the Degrees property is true, radians otherwise.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPolar.PiRatioAnnotation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether polar charts measured in radians should be annotated with Pi ratios.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartRadar
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Radar charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartRadar.Degrees
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Start value is specified in degrees or radians.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartRadar.Start
member.summary:
Gets or sets the starting angle, measured counter-clockwise from the 12 o'clock position.
The angle is measured in degrees if the Degrees property is true, radians otherwise.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartRadar.Filled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Radar charts should be filled.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartRadar.FlatGridLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Radar charts should use flat Y coordinate gridlines. By default, Y coordinate gridlines are circular.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBubble
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Bubble charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBubble.EncodingMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the method used for calculating bubble size in a bubble chart.

remarks.para: The maximum and minimum bubble sizes represent the percentage of the diameter or area of the plot area, depending upon the value of the EncodingMethod property.
At this time the Bubble Method is always based on the diameter.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBubble.MaximumSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum bubble size in a bubble chart, as percentage of the diameter (or area) of the plot area.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartBubble.MinimumSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum bubble size in a bubble chart, as percentage of the diameter (or area) of the plot area.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHilo
member.summary: Represents properties specific to HiLo, HiLoOpenClose and Candle charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHilo.FillFalling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether filled candles represent falling values (true) or rising values (false).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHilo.FillTransparent
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether open candles are transparent (true) or filled with the series symbol color (false).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHilo.FullWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the opening and closing values of a Hi-Lo-Open-Close chart are represented by a horizontal line on both sides of the Hi-Lo bar.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHilo.ShowClose
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the closing value is shown in a Hi-Lo-Open-Close chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHilo.ShowOpen
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the opening value is shown in a Hi-Lo-Open-Close chart.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartGantt
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Gantt charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartGantt.AxisLabelsSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source of x-axis labels for a Gantt chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartGantt.ShowSymbols
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether symbols are shown in a Gantt chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartGantt.Width
member.summary: Gets or sets the percentage that each bar occupies.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogram
member.summary: Represents properties specific to Histogram charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogram.NormalDisplay
member.summary: Gets an object describing a Gaussian normal curve display.
member.remarks: Histograms and frequency graphs are used to show the distribution of data values. Very often, the data distributions are compared to normal distributions. The properties of the ChartNormalCurve object control the appearance of a built in display of a Normal (Gaussian) curve for comparison. The normal curve is unrelated to the data.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogram.NormalizationInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the normalization interval width.
member.remarks: When histograms with non-uniform intervals are generated, each interval is typically normalized such that each interval height represents the same frequency per unit width. This preserves the most appropriate histogram shape. The normalization interval width is the width to which all other intervals are normalized. Intervals with the same width as the normalization width, will have a height which directly indicates its value.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogram.Normalized
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether each histogram series interval is normalized.
member.remarks: When histograms with non-uniform intervals are generated, each interval is typically normalized such that each interval height represents the same frequency per unit width. This preserves the most appropriate histogram shape.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartNormalCurve
member.summary: Represents properties that help define the appearance of the normal curve for the Histogram chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartNormalCurve.ForegroundDisplay
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Normal (Gaussian) curve is displayed on top of the chart data display.
By default, the Normal (Gaussian) curve is displayed behind all charted data. Setting this to true specifies that the Normal curve should be drawn on top of the charted data.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartNormalCurve.Visible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Normal curve is drawn.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartNormalCurve.UseAntiAlias
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Normal curve is drawn using anti-aliasing.
By default, the normal curve is drawn using anti-aliasing methods. Setting this to false overrides this behavior.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartNormalCurve.FillStyle
member.summary: Gets the object controlling the appearance of the area under the Normal curve.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartNormalCurve.LineStyle
member.summary: Gets the object controlling the appearance of the line representing the Normal curve.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DArea
member.summary: Represents the chart area of a 3D chart. This area includes plot cube, all axes and the charted data.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DArea.Style
member.summary: Gets the chart area style. Inherits from .

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DArea.AxisX
member.summary: Gets the X-axis object.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DArea.AxisY
member.summary: Gets the Y-axis object.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DArea.AxisZ
member.summary: Gets the Z-axis object.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DArea.View
member.summary: Gets the object controlling the appearance of plot cube in 3D-space.

member.summary: Gets or sets the annotation method of the axis.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DAxis.AnnoPosition

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DAxis.AnnoRotated

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DAxis.MajorGrid
member.summary: Gets the major grid lines object. Major grids are placed coincident with major tickmarks at UnitMajor intervals. This property is used to set the grid line appearance.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DAxis.ValueLabels
member.summary: Gets the labels collection for this axis.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartValueLabelsCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView
member.summary: Represents three-dimensional features of a 3D chart.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ShouldSerializeBackColor
member.summary: Returns false if the BackColor property is in the default state. The default state is to inherit the BackColor from the Chart3DArea object.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ResetBackColor
member.summary: Resets the BackColor property to default state.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ShouldSerializeForeColor
member.summary: Returns false if the ForeColor property is in the default state. The default state is to inherit the ForeColor from the Chart3DArea object.

member.name: M:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ResetForeColor
member.summary: Resets the ForeColor property to default state.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.AutoFit
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the x/y ratio for 2D projection is calculated automatically.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.AxisFont
member.summary: Gets or sets the axis annotation font, measured in hundredths of the unit cube size. All axes have the same axis font.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.AxisTitleFont
member.summary: Gets or sets the axis title font, measured in hundredths of the unit cube size. All axes have the same axis title font.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the background color of plot cube. Inherits from Chart3DArea.Style.BackColor.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color of plot cube. Inherits from Chart3DArea.Style.ForeColor.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.Boxed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all plotting cube edges are rendered.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.Ceiling
member.summary: Gets the Chart3DProject object for ceiling. The projection of contours and zones onto the z=zmax plane. This property is used only in surface charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.Floor
member.summary: Gets the Chart3DProject object for floor. The projection of contours and zones onto the z=zmin plane. This property is used only in surface charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.Perspective
member.summary: Gets or sets the perspective of 3-D view. Must be a value greater than 1. Higher values reduce the perspective effect and approach a parallel projection.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.RotationX
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the plot cube about the X-axis, in degrees.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.RotationY
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the plot cube about the Y-axis, in degrees.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.RotationZ
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation of the plot cube about the Z-axis, in degrees.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.TextRotation
member.summary: Gets or sets text rotation for axis titles and axis annotations.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ViewportHorizontalShift
member.summary: Gets or sets horizontal shift of chart viewport.
member.remarks: Specifies the degree of horizontal view translation from a full view (a maximal, non-clipped view). Translation is relative to a normalized box with origin in the bottom left corner. Translation of more than a full unit (more than 1.0 or -1.0) causes the view to translate "out of view" when ViewPortScale=1.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ViewportScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the degree of scaling (zooming) of chart viewport up or down from a full (maximal, non-clipped) view.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.ViewportVerticalShift
member.summary: Gets or sets the vertical shift of chart viewport.
member.remarks: Specifies the degree of vertical view translation from a full view. Translation is relative to a normalized box with origin in the bottom left corner. Translation of more than a full unit (more than 1.0 or -1.0) causes the view to translate out of view when ViewPortScale=1.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.XScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of scaling in the X-axis direction, measured as relation to the height (Z-axis) of the cube.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.YScale
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of scaling in the Y-axis direction, measured as relation to the height (Z-axis) of the cube.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DView.View3D
member.summary: Gets or sets the predefined view.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DProjection
member.summary: Represents projection (floor or ceiling) for contour and zones charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DProjection.IsContoured
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether projected contours are to be drawn. If True, projected contours are drawn regardless of the value of the IsContoured property of the Chart3DContour object.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DProjection.IsZoned
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the projected zones are to be drawn. If True, projected contours are drawn regardless of the value of the IsZoned property of the Chart3DContour object.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DGridLines
member.summary: Represetns properties used to control the appearance of grid.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DGridLines.IsOnXYPlane
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grid lines are to appear on the XY-plane. In 2D projections, grid lines are drawn perpendicular to the axis.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DGridLines.IsOnXZPlane
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grid lines are to appear on the XZ-plane. In 2D projections, grid lines are drawn perpendicular to the axis.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DGridLines.IsOnYZPlane
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether grid lines are to appear on the YZ-plane. In 2D projections, grid lines are drawn perpendicular to the axis.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DGridLines.Style
member.summary: Gets the line style used to draw the grid.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartData.Hole
member.summary: Gets or sets the data hole value. Data holes are used as placeholders for data points that indicate data is normally present but not in this case.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartData.IsForEachRecord
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the data is selected by each record. By default, the data is grouped by CategoryGroups. If this is true, the data is not grouped and the first category group provides labels in X-Axis.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartData.ColorMode
member.summary:
Gets or sets the mode for setting the color of each category and series.
Available for 2D Bar, Pie, Candle, Gantt, HiLo, HiLoOpenClose, Line, Radar, and Step chart types and 3D Bar chart type.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartData.CategoryGroups
member.summary: Gets the collection of category groups which provide labels for X-Axis. Empty collection means group all records in one group.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartData.SeriesGroups
member.summary: Gets the collection of optional series group for extra levels of data.
member.remarks: Optional, provides extra levels of data (for example, Orders by Country can be broken down by years as well). Labels for the series are displayed in the legend.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartData.SeriesValues
member.summary: Gets the collection of series values which define the template of each series.
member.remarks: At least one series value exists.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation
member.summary: Represents properties controlling the appearance of different chart types.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.DepthCur
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a scatter chart's point sizes are dependant upon their distance from the eye.
member.remarks: Relevant only for scatter charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.DropLines
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a scatter chart's points should have drop lines.
member.remarks: Relevant only for scatter charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.IsMeshed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether surface charts are meshed, or whether bars in bar charts are outlined.
member.remarks: Relevant only for bar and surface charts. Set this property to true to display a surface as a mesh, or to display bars in outline format. The IsColumnMeshShowing and IsRowMeshShowing properties of the Chart3DSurface object control allow mesh lines in either the X or the Y direction to be turned off.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.IsShaded
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether surface or bar charts use shading.
member.remarks: Relevant only for bar and surface charts. Set this property to true to display surfaces and bars as a flat shade of color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.MeshBottomColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom color of a mesh.
member.remarks: For bar charts, this color is used for bars with a value less than that specified by the Chart3DBar Origin property.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.MeshTopColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the top color of the mesh.
member.remarks: For bar charts, this color is used for bars with a value greater than that specified by the Chart3DBar Origin property.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.ShadedBottomColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the bottom color of the shaded surface.
member.remarks: For bar charts, this color is used for bars with a value less than that specified by the Chart3DBar Origin property.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.ShadedTopColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the top color of a shaded surface.
member.remarks: For bar charts, this color is used for bars with a value greater than that specified by the Chart3DBar Origin property.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DElevation.Transparency
member.summary: Gets or sets the transparency of chart data, from 0 (transparent) to 255 (opaque). Used only for non-contoured and non-zoned charts.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DSurface
member.summary: Represents properties specific to suface charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DSurface.ColumnMeshFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency with which column mesh lines are drawn.
member.remarks: When this property has the value n, every nth mesh line is drawn. This mesh filter applies to both regular and irregular grids. When this property is set to 0, the chart automatically chooses a mesh filter.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DSurface.IsColumnMeshShowing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column mesh lines should appear.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DSurface.IsRowMeshShowing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the row mesh lines should appear.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart3DSurface.RowMeshFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency with which row mesh lines are drawn.
member.remarks: When this property has the value n, every nth mesh line is drawn. This mesh filter applies to both regular and irregular grids. When this property is set to 0, the chart automatically chooses a mesh filter.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartUnboundDataSeries.SeriesData
member.summary: Gets the current ChartUnboundDataSeries object. This property is only intended for use in the property browsers. It is not useful in code.

remarks.para: As a convenience, all relevant ChartUnboundDataSeries data arrays can be edited at the same time in a property browser by editing the SeriesData property. Data arrays are considered relevant only if the array is used to display the current ChartType.

For example, editing SeriesData for an XYPlot would invoke the data editor containing the X and Y data arrays. Editing SeriesData for a Candle chart would invoke the data editor containing the X, Y, Y1, Y2 and Y3 data arrays.
The SeriesData property is intended to be used only within property browsers, as it is merely a placeholder to allow invocation of the editor. The value returned is the object of which it is a part.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesHistogram
member.summary: Represents properties specific to histogram charts.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesHistogram.DisplayType
member.summary: Gets or sets the method used to display the frequency data.
member.remarks: Frequency data can be displayed in a different manner on a per series basis, making it possible to mix display types in a single chart group.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesHistogram.IntervalCreationMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the method used to specify the histogram intervals.
member.remarks:
Interval boundaries can be established in a variety of ways.
When the Automatic method is used, the chart calculates the upper and lower limits of the intervals using the maximum and minimum data values, and restricting the intervals to lie within 3 standard deviations of the data mean. The number of intervals is optional. Interval boundaries are calculated uniformly.
When the SemiAutomatic method is used, the upper and lower limits of the intervals are specified together with the number of intervals. Interval boundaries are calculated uniformly.
When the XDataBoundaries method is used, the X values of the data data series are used to explicitly set each interval boundary. The X values are sorted and duplicate values are eliminated. Each ascending value of the result is used determine the next interval boundary. Thus, the first and second resulting X values define the first interval and each successive X value specifies the end of the next interval. Note that specification of N intervals requires N+1 unique X values.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesHistogram.IntervalNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of intervals in the histogram.
member.remarks: The IntervalNumber property applies only to histograms created with Automatic and SemiAutomatic methods. When the XDataBoundaries method is used, the number of intervals is defined as 1 less than the number of unique X values specified.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesHistogram.IntervalStart
member.summary: Gets or sets the numeric value of the beginning of the first interval.
member.remarks: Applies only to the SemiAutomatic creation method.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesHistogram.IntervalWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the numeric value of the width of each interval.
member.remarks: Applies only to the SemiAutomatic creation method.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Vertical
member.summary: A pattern of vertical lines.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.ForwardDiagonal
member.summary: A pattern of lines diagonal from upper left to lower right.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.BackwardDiagonal
member.summary: A pattern of lines diagonal from upper right to lower left.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Cross
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines that cross.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DiagonalCross
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines that cross. The lines are antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent05
member.summary: Specifies a 5-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 5:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent10
member.summary: Specifies a 10-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 10:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent20
member.summary: Specifies a 20-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 20:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent25
member.summary: Specifies a 25-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 25:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent30
member.summary: Specifies a 30-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 30:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent40
member.summary: Specifies a 40-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 40:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent50
member.summary: Specifies a 50-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 50:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent60
member.summary: Specifies a 60-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 60:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent70
member.summary: Specifies a 70-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 70:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent75
member.summary: Specifies a 75-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 75:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent80
member.summary: Specifies a 80-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 80:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Percent90
member.summary: Specifies a 90-percent hatch. The ratio of foreground color to background color is 90:100.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.LightDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points and are spaced 50 percent closer together than ForwardDiagonal, but they are not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.LightUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points and are spaced 50 percent closer together than BackwardDiagonal, but they are not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DarkDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, are spaced 50 percent closer together than, and are twice the width of ForwardDiagonal. This hatch pattern is not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DarkUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points, are spaced 50 percent closer together than BackwardDiagonal, and are twice its width, but the lines are not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.WideDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style ForwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.WideUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points, have the same spacing as hatch style BackwardDiagonal, and are triple its width, but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.LightVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Vertical.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.LightHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Horizontal.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.NarrowVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 75 percent closer together than hatch style Vertical (or 25 percent closer together than LightVertical).

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.NarrowHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 75 percent closer together than hatch style Horizontal (or 25 percent closer together than LightHorizontal).

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DarkVertical
member.summary: Specifies vertical lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Vertical and are twice its width.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DarkHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are spaced 50 percent closer together than Horizontal and are twice its width.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DashedDownwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines that slant to the right from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DashedUpwardDiagonal
member.summary: Specifies dashed diagonal lines that slant to the left from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DashedHorizontal
member.summary: Specifies dashed horizontal lines.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DashedVertical
member.summary: Specifies dashed vertical lines.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.SmallConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of confetti.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.LargeConfetti
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of confetti, and is composed of larger pieces than SmallConfetti.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.ZigZag
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of zigzags.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Wave
member.summary: Specifies horizontal lines that are composed of tildes.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DiagonalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of layered bricks that slant to the left from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.HorizontalBrick
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of horizontally layered bricks.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Weave
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a woven material.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Plaid
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a plaid material.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Divot
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of divots.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DottedGrid
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines, each of which is composed of dots that cross.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.DottedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines, each of which is composed of dots, that cross.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Shingle
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of diagonally-layered shingles that slant to the right from top points to bottom points.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Trellis
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a trellis.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.Sphere
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of spheres laid adjacent to one another.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.SmallGrid
member.summary: Specifies horizontal and vertical lines that cross and are spaced 50 percent closer together than hatch style Cross.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.SmallCheckerBoard
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a checkerboard.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.LargeCheckerBoard
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a checkerboard with squares that are twice the size of SmallCheckerBoard.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.OutlinedDiamond
member.summary: Specifies forward diagonal and backward diagonal lines that cross but are not antialiased.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHatchStyle.SolidDiamond
member.summary: Specifies a hatch that has the appearance of a checkerboard placed diagonally.

member.summary: Sets text to be left-aligned and numbers to be right-aligned.

member.summary: Aligns text to the near side (left side in left-to-right mode).

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignHorz.Center
member.summary: Aligns text to the center.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignHorz.Far
member.summary: Aligns cell text to the far side (right side in left-to-right mode).

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignHorz.Justify
member.summary: Spreads text throughout.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Left
member.summary: Image is aligned to the left.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Right
member.summary: Image is aligned to the right.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Top
member.summary: Image is aligned to the Top.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Bottom
member.summary: Image is aligned to the bottom.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Center
member.summary: Image is center-aligned.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Scale
member.summary: Image is scaled to fit the image area.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Stretch
member.summary: Image is stretched to fit image area.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAlignImage.Tile
member.summary: Image is tiled throughout the image area.

member.summary: Aligns text to the center.

member.summary: Object is positioned north or above.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartCompass.South
member.summary: Object is positioned south or below.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartCompass.East
member.summary: Object is positioned east or to the right side.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartCompass.West

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFitType
member.summary: Specifies the curve fit type of the data eries.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFitType.Line
member.summary: Straight lines connect data points.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFitType.Spline
member.summary: Line passes smoothly through each data point; there are no sharp corners and no abrupt changes in the tightness of the curve.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFitType.Beziers
member.summary: Line does not pass through all data points, but the points act as magnets, pulling the curve in certain directions and influencing the way the curve bends.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesDisplay
member.summary: Specifies the display of the data series.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesDisplay.Show
member.summary: Displays series.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesDisplay.Hide
member.summary: Includes series in the data set, but is not drawn.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesDisplay.Exclude
member.summary: Excludes series from the data set.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartSeriesDisplay.ExcludeHoles
member.summary: Displays series, but disregards data holes.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPlotFilterMethod
member.summary: Specifies the plot filter method of the data series.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPlotFilterMethod.None
member.summary: Data values are not filtered.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPlotFilterMethod.Default
member.summary: Default data filtering algorithm optimizes plotting of large data arrays.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartPlotFilterMethod.Alternative
member.summary: Alternative data filtering algorithm optimizes plotting of large data arrays which are ordered along one direction(x or y).

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethod
member.summary: Specifies the attachment method of the label.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethod.Coordinate
member.summary: Label can be attached to anywhere on the chart. The number of twips between the top-left corner of the chart to the ChartLabel can be specified.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethod.DataCoordinate
member.summary: Label is attached to anywhere inside the PlotArea. The data coordinates can be specified. This method is not allowed on pie charts. If any part of the ChartLabel falls outside of the ChartArea, it is clipped.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethod.DataIndex
member.summary: Label is attached to a specific data point on the chart. The series and point indices and the chart group can be specified.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethod.DataIndexY
member.summary: Label is attached to a distance above or below a specific data point. The series and point indices, the ChartGroup, and the Y-coordinate can be specified. This is most useful for bar and stacking bar charts. For 2D chart only.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass
member.summary: Specifies the position of the label relative it's spefified location.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.North
member.summary: Places label to the north or above the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.NorthEast
member.summary: Places label to the NorthEast or above and right of the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.East
member.summary: Places label to the East or to the right of the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.SouthEast
member.summary: Places label to the SouthEast or below and right of the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.South
member.summary: Places label to the South or below the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.SouthWest
member.summary: Places label to the SouthWest or below and left of the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.West
member.summary: Places label to the West or left of the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.NorthWest
member.summary: Places label to the NorthWest or above and left of the data point.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.Radial
member.summary: In a pie chart, places label directly away from the center of the chart.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.Orthogonal
member.summary: Places label perpendicularly away from the plot line.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.Auto
member.summary: Places label automatically. The parameters of auto-arrangement are specified in AutoArrangment property of ChartLabels class.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelCompass.RadialText
member.summary: Places label perpendicularly away from the plot line and orients the text along that line.

member.summary: Specifies the method of label auto arrangement.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAutoLabelArrangementMethod.Decimation
member.summary: The method removes labels which cannot be placed without overlapping.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAutoLabelArrangementMethod.FindingOptimum
member.summary: This method tries to position labels avoiding its overlapping.

member.summary: Allows left label position.

member.summary: Allows bottom label position.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAutoLabelArrangementOptions.Right
member.summary: Allows right label position.

member.summary: Allows bottom left label position.

member.summary: Labels should not cover data points.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLinePattern
member.summary: Specifies the pattern of the line.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLinePattern.Solid
member.summary: A solid line.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLinePattern.Dash
member.summary: A dashed line.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLinePattern.Dot
member.summary: A dotted line.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLinePattern.DashDot
member.summary: A line with alternating dashes and dots.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLinePattern.DashDotDot
member.summary: A line with series consisting of a dash followed by two dots.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLineJoin
member.summary: Specifies how to join consecutive line or curve segments in a figure (subpath).

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLineJoin.Miter
member.summary: Specifies a mitered join. This produces a sharp corner or a clipped corner, depending on whether the length of the miter exceeds the miter limit.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLineJoin.Bevel
member.summary: Specifies a beveled join. This produces a diagonal corner.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLineJoin.Round
member.summary: Specifies a circular join. This produces a smooth, circular arc between the lines.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLineJoin.MiterClipped
member.summary: Specifies a mitered join. This produces a sharp corner or a beveled corner, depending on whether the length of the miter exceeds the miter limit.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFillType
member.summary: Specifies how data shapes are filled.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFillType.SolidColor
member.summary: Solid color is used for filling using Color1.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFillType.Gradient
member.summary: A two color gradient is used to fill using Color1 and Color2 with a pattern enumerated by the .

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFillType.Hatch
member.summary: A two color hatch pattern is used to fill using Color1 and Color2 with a pattern enumerated by the .

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartFillType.Texture
member.summary: A texture is created by filing the specified image of the .

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramDisplayType
member.summary: Specifies the method used to display the frequency data.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramDisplayType.Histogram
member.summary: Displays the intervals and counts as a histogram.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramDisplayType.FrequencyGraph
member.summary: Displays the intervals and counts as a frequency graph.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramDisplayType.SteppedFrequencyGraph
member.summary: Displays the intervals and counts as a stepped frequency graph.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramIntervalMethod
member.summary: Specifies the method used to specify the histogram intervals.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramIntervalMethod.Automatic
member.summary: Interval boundaries and width are calculated based on the data statistics. The number of intervals is an optional input.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramIntervalMethod.SemiAutomatic
member.summary: Starting interval, interval width, and the number of intervals specify interval boundaries.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartHistogramIntervalMethod.XDataBoundaries
member.summary: The X data inputs will be used for interval boundaries.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegendOrientation
member.summary: Specifies the orientation of the chart legend.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegendOrientation.Auto
member.summary: Horizontal for legends with north and south Compass values, and Vertical for legends with east and west Compass values.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegendOrientation.Vertical
member.summary: Legend entries are added side by side as (horizontally) as legend width permits. If sufficient width is not available, additional legend rows are created.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegendOrientation.Horizontal
member.summary: Legend entries are stacked vertically as legend height permits. If sufficient height is not available, additional legend columns are created.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegendOrientation.HorizontalVariableItemWidth
member.summary: The same as Horizontal, but entries can have different widths according to its content.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegendOrientation.VerticalVariableItemHeight
member.summary: The same as Vertical, but entries can have different heights according to its content.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelView3D
member.summary: Specifies the 3D-view plane of the chart label of 3D chart.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelView3D.None
member.summary: Label is drawn in 2D plane of screen.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabelView3D.XZ
member.summary: Label is drawn in 3D plane parallel to XZ plane.

member.summary: No annotations along the axis.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DTickLabels.High
member.summary: Annotations are drawn near the maximum value of the perpendicular axis, and inside the plot area. For X axis annotations, if data is not available for Group0 and is available for Group1, the Y2 axis determines the location, otherwise the Y axis is used. Annotations which overlap the crossing axis are eliminated.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DTickLabels.Low
member.summary: Annotations are drawn near the minimum value of the perpendicular axis, and inside the plot area. For X axis annotations, if data is not available for Group0 and is available for Group1, the Y2 axis determines the location, otherwise the Y axis is used. Annotations which overlap the crossing axis are eliminated.

member.name: F:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.Chart2DTickLabels.NextToAxis
member.summary: Annotations are drawn next to the axis.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of ChartLabel object.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a connecting line is drawn to the associated data point.
member.remarks: If drawn, this connecting line is one pixel wide, and is drawn using the foregorund color.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the label name.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.Offset
member.summary: Gets or sets the offset distance from the associated data point in twips.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the label text.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.AttachMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the label attachment method.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.AttachMethodData
member.summary: Gets the attachment data for the label.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.Compass
member.summary: Gets or sets the position of the label relative to its specified location.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.RotationOverride
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angle of the label, in degrees. Overrides the Rotation value set in the style.
member.remarks: 2D Chart only. Applies only to label with Compass values other than Radial and RadialText. Only nonzero values are applied.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.View3D
member.summary: Gets or set the 3D-View plane of a label of a 3D chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.Style
member.summary: Gets the ChartStyle object of the label. Inherits from the ChartLabels.DefaultLabelStyle property.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLabel.Image
member.summary: Gets or sets the label's image.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData
member.summary: Specifies how a is placed or attached to a chart.
member.remarks: Each of the ChartAttachMethodData object properties is meaningful only in the context of a value.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData.GroupIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the group index of the data point to attach a label when the label AttachMethod property specifies DataIndex attachment. For 2D charts only (for 3D charts, there is only one chart group).

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData.SeriesIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the series index of the data point to attach a label to when the label AttachmentMethod property specifies DataIndex attachment.
member.remarks: For 3D chart, it means the series index of the data point if the data layout specified is point layout, and the column of the data point if the data layout sepcified is regular or irregular grid.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData.PointIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the point index of the data point to attach a label to when the label AttachMethod property specifies DataIndex attachment.
member.remarks: For 3D chart, it means the point index of the data point if the data layout specified is point layout, and means the row of the data point if the data layout specified is regular or irregular grid.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData.X
member.summary: Gets or sets the X coordinate (client or data) when label AttachMethod property specifies Coordinate or DataCoordinate attachment.
member.remarks: The units is twips for client coordinate.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData.Y
member.summary: Gets or sets the Y coordinate (client or data) when label AttachMethod property specifies Coordinate, DataCoordinate or DataIndexY attachment.
member.remarks: The units is twips for client coordinate. It means the Y data coordinate for DataIndexY (2D chart Only) attachment.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartAttachMethodData.Z
member.summary: Gets or sets the Z data coordinate when label AttachMethod property specifies DataCoordinate attachment.
member.remarks: 3D chart only.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartStyle.Autowrap
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text automatically wraps.
member.remarks: Most text containing objects within Chart can automatically wrap text within them, including header, footer, axes titles, labels and the legend (title only, not series names). However, all of these objects can be sized automatically. Automatic sizing is always based upon a single line of text whenever possible.

member.summary: Gets the object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the foreground color.

member.summary: Gets or sets the image alignment.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartStyle.Opaque
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background is opaque.
member.remarks: If an object's Opaque property is true, then the object's background is brushed in the backcolor before the foreground is drawn. If an object's Opaque property is false, the background is not brushed and only the object's foreground is drawn.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartStyle.Rotation
member.summary: Gets or sets the text rotation.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartStyle.VerticalAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the text vertical alignment.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartStyle.VerticalText
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text is displayed vertically.
member.remarks: VerticalText allows some double byte characters to be rendered from top to bottom instead of left to right. For single byte characters VerticalText appears as rotated text, 90 degrees in the clockwise direction.

member.name: T:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegend
member.summary: Represents the legend of a chart.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegend.Compass
member.summary: Gets or sets the general positioning of the legend.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegend.Style
member.summary: Gets the legend style. Inherits from the ChartField default style.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegend.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the legend text.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegend.Orientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the legend entries.

remarks.para: The legend entries can be oriented in a vertical or horizontal fashion.

Vertical orientation indicates that legend entries will stack vertically as the legend height permits. If the legend height cannot contain all of the entries and the legend is allowed to size itself, then additional columns of stacked entries will be added to the legend.

Horizontal orientation indicates that legend entries will be created side by side as legend width permits. If the legend width cannot contain all of the entries and the legend is allowed to size itself, then additional rows of entries will be added to the legend.

Auto orientation automatically selects an appropriate orientation based upon the legend Compass property. For east and west Compass values, Vertical orientation is used. For north and south Compass values, Horizontal orientation is used.

member.name: P:C1.Win.FlexReport.Chart.ChartLegend.Legend2DReversed
member.summary: Gets or sets the order of the ChartGroups2D in the legend of a 2D chart.
member.remarks: Use LegendReversed property of to reverse series order.
